word_mean: 中间层顶至250km(在太阳宁静期)或500km左右(太阳活动期)之间的大气层。层内温度随高度的增加而递增，层顶温度可达1 500K。

sentence.Network_en: The temperature rises rapidly to between 500 k and 2000 k in the region known as the thermosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 在称之为“热层”地区域内,温度很快上升到500K与2000K之间.

sentence.Network_en: When solar activity is high, solar extreme ultraviolet rays warm and expand the thermosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 当太阳活动剧烈时, 太阳极端的紫外线会加热并使热大气层扩张.

sentence.Network_en: After the thermosphere is the thermopause, which is the outer most boundary of the thermosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 热成层之后是热成层顶, 它是热成层的最外边界.
